solution_line_template: At the store, {avoid_checkout_fraction} of shoppers prefer to avoid the check-out line, a total of {avoid_checkout_fraction}*{total_shoppers} = <<{avoid_checkout_fraction}*{total_shoppers}={shoppers_avoiding_checkout}>>{shoppers_avoiding_checkout}

The total number of shoppers at the store is {total_shoppers}; those who prefer the check-out line is {total_shoppers}-{shoppers_avoiding_checkout} = <<{total_shoppers}-{shoppers_avoiding_checkout}={shoppers_preferring_checkout}>>{shoppers_preferring_checkout}
